head.supplied: VICTORIA. ¶ L b. — CLAUSE 39 OF REGULATIONS. ¶ The Government of Victoria, ¶ Dr. to ¶ Sir Ferdinand von Mueller ¶ Department ¶ ¶ Chief Secretary, Govt. Botanist's Branch...

div.p: RB MSS M1, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3346in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3346in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: MS is a form, the bottom half of which has been torn off. The remainder, found in a specimen folder at MEL, had been folded to make an envelope, on the outside of which (i.e. on the verso of the form) has been written in an unidentified hand, ‘Neptunia gracilis Dietrich’.

cell.style: padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3346in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3346in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: Boxes below this text headed ‘Treasury Register, Number’ and ‘Treasury Voucher, Number’ have not been filled in.

div.p: Dr. to Sir Ferdinand von Mueller

Department
Chief Secretary, Govt. Botanist's Branch
Amount required for reimbursement of expenditure defrayed by me by means of the amount of £30.-.- received on the 25th October 1892 as per accompanying Vouchers, viz.:—

Charles H. French.
